Bradley, Todd wrote:
> Has anyone else put something like this together?  Mike mentioned he's
> heard of others who want to build such a results graphing tool, but
> didn't know if anyone's got one they're sharing.  So I'm posting here,
> looking for pointers.

Bradley, I've been thinking of something similar.

I understand that Agitar's tool can do something like this, which may be a 
starting point if you've got more money than time (I don't know the price 
of Agitator, but I understand it's not cheap).

Given your particular requirements, I would suggest using a tool such as 
CruiseControl to regularly run builds, saving the XML log files away, and 
post-processing them afterwards to produce the data you desire.

Robert.

-- 
                "Software is too expensive to build cheaply"
